articles.title: 'The longest any American has been in space': Astronaut returns to earth after 355 days - CNN
articles.description: CNN’s Erin Burnett talks to NASA astronaut Mark Vande Hei who returned to earth after a record-setting mission of 355 days in space. #CNN #News

articles.author: Sam Long
articles.title: Fritz Hager Completely Reinvents "Wonderwall" on 'American Idol' - American Songwriter
articles.description: It takes a bold artist to play an overdone song like Oasis’s “Wonderwall.” “American Idol” contestant Fritz Hager proved to the judges that he could make it his own.
articles.content: It takes a bold artist to take a song like Oasiss Wonderwall and play it for a future-altering performance. If someone breaks out a guitar at a party, you know exactly what song is coming. Why choose… [+1606 chars]

articles.title: 2023 VW Amarok Details Released: Bigger, More Capable, Premium Trims - Motor1
articles.description: Volkswagen Commercial Vehicles has released comprehensive details about the all-new Amarok, which will gain upscale Panamericana and Aventura trim levels.
articles.content: Named after a wolf deity in Inuit mythology, the Amarok has been around since 2010 and is months away from switching to the second generation. The body-on-frame truck will transition from a VW platfo… [+2438 chars]
